charges.charge_description: 18:286 and 3551 et seq. FRAUD, CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD, OTHER (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment including sentence under the sentencing reform act Dft plead guilty to Count l of a 5 count indictment Counts 2-5 are dismissed on the motion of the U.S. It is ordered that the Dft shall pay to the U.S. a special assessment of $50.00 which shall be due immediately The Dft is comitted to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons for a term of l5 months The dft shall surrender for service of sentence on 9/30/93 @10:00 at his own expense or surrender to U.S. Marshal of EDNY at a earlier date The dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:286 286 and 3551 et seq. FRAUD, CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD, OTHER (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment Including Sentence Under the Sentencing Reform Act dated 9/25/92. The deft pleaded guilty to count one of the indictment. All open counts are dismissed on the motion of the United States. It is ordered that the deft shall pay to the United States a special assessment of $50.00, which shall be due immediately. The deft is hereby placed on probation for a term of five years. Defendant shall serve three months home confinement, unless Mr. Beckles gains employment at which time his home confinement will be reduced to one month. The defendant shall make restitution to the following persons in the following amounts: IRS $5,509.00; Mellon Bank located in Pennsylvania $5,873.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 287-Presented fraudulently prepared tax returns for electronic filing with the IRS. [9:92-m-160]
18:286 286 and 3551 et seq. FRAUD, CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD, OTHER (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pleaded guilty to Count 4 of the Indictment All other counts are dismissed on motion of the U.S. It is ordered that the dft shall pay to the U.S. a special assessment of $50.00 which shall be due immediately The dft is placed on probation for a term of (5) five years. Special conditions of probation are that the Dft serve (6) months home detention During this six month period the Dft is only to be releasd for employment No nights or weekends. Also, the Dft shall receive drug treatment as directed by the Probation Dept; Furthermore, the Dft shall receive residence drug treatment if necessary The dft shall make restitution to the Internal Revenue Service in the amount of $5,509.00 and to the Mellon Bank in Pennsylvania in the amount of $2,971.00 for a total of $8,480.00 AMENDED JUDGMENT: Ordered by Ch. J. Platt on 12/7/92 3 months imprisonment and 3 years supervised release Restitution shall stay the same (Internal Revenue Service amount of Restitution $5, 509.00) (Mellon Bank in Pennsylvania $2,971.00) for a total restitution of $8, 480.00 and a $50.00 special assessment AMENDED VIOLATION OF PROBATION: Dft now sentenced as follows: 3 months imprisonment and 3 years supervised release Restitution shall stay the same (Internal Revenue Service amount of restitution $5, 509.00) (Mellon Bank in Pennsylvania $2, 971.00) for a total of restitution $8,480.00 and a $50.00 special assessment Also, the Dft shall receive drug treatment as directed by the Probation Department and receive residence drug treatment (4)
